testCases

Class DriverScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalAutomation.SeleniumActionFunctions
      • testCases.DriverScript

  • public class DriverScript
extends SeleniumActionFunctions

    This is the class that contains the main test method which is to be run. Various TestNG annotations are included to perform different tasks. It includes all the Test data specific operations that must be performed. We can have all the TestCases in this very class by using different

    Author:
    Mehak Bains

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class finalAutomation.SeleniumActionFunctions

        currentRowInDataExcel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DriverScript() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterScript()
      Runs once after all the tests have been executed and quits from the driver.
      void beforeScript()
      Runs every time before a test and opens the website.
      void createResultSheet()
      Runs only once before all the tests to initiate all parameters specific to the website in question by calling the constructor of class WebsiteSpecificData and to create an excelSheet to store test results.
      void main()
      The main test method which includes various Selenium Actions to be performed and is run as many times as the invocationCount.
      void setupAfterSuite()
      Writes recorded test results in the test result excel sheet and sends this excel sheet as an attachment in an email as required.
      void writeResults(org.testng.ITestResult result)
      Runs after every other test and records the test results in a LinkedHashMap.

      • Methods inherited from class finalAutomation.SeleniumActionFunctions

        clickAction, openWebsite, selectAction, sendKeysAction

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • writeResults

        public void writeResults(org.testng.ITestResult result)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs after every other test and records the test results in a LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        result - The result(Success, Failure or Skipped) of the test executed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
